ProductInfo.Features:
Plug and play, super simple installation and operation. (Insert a Micro-SD card / TF card into the camera, screw in like a bulb and turn on power) 2 3W real white lights(controlled by remote control ON/OFF) for lighting and 2 the third generation IR LED array for night vision. Video recording is based on power, once the power is on it will keep recording. Accept AC 110V-250V for worldwide usage. Looks like a real bulb and potential thefts would not discover it as a security camera.
Recording Indication Light On/Off:Recording indication light On, blue indication light will be flashing when recording. Recording indication light Off means no light when recording. Time Stamp on Video:Stamping the date time on video or not. Recording Audio:Recording video with sound or not. Date time:Use computer system time or customize a time.
This CCTV Security Digital Video Recorder(DVR) camera is an innovative design and being patented. It is very easy to be used worldwide, just insert a Micro-SD card and screw-in like a bulb, and turn on the power, it will automatically record the video. The key advantage is that it does not need any technical background, you know how to install a bulb and then you know how to use it. Besides, its video files are so small that a 32GB Micro-SD card can store more than 8 days video files(CIF format). It brings security into environment by your own like home, office, factory, shopping mall, restaurant and so on.
Local storage, support Micro-SD card 2GB - 32GB, using 3GP video format. And 4GB Card stores 24hrs video files(CIF format). Built-in a powerful security management system, 7 major functions are optional to meet different application needs. All setting changes and updates are done on Micro-SD card, quick, simple and easy. Comes with 200mm long bulb extension adapter (E27 to E27). It is used to extend the bulb camera from bulb holder, so that the bulb camera can be used to shoot objects in different directions. The flexible tube is bendable. The bending angle is about 90 degree.
7 Major Functions: Recording Mode: Real time / Motion Detection Only;Real time recording: Video files will be recorded continuously in 30 mins per file. Motion detection only: Records moving objects only. Resolution: VGA/CIF	Two video resolutions for selection, VGA 640 * 480 / CIF 352 * 288 Video File Storage Mode: Circular / Non-Circular:Circular storage means if Micro-SD card is full, it will overwrite earlier files and keep storing. Non-circular storage means when Micro-SD card is full then stop recording.
